message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you the chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000. I believe this reflects its true worth and the benefits it will bring to you.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm not willing to pay that much. I'm willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and the potential benefits it will bring to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but I believe my initial offer is closer to the product's true value.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,400,000. This offer reflects my willingness to negotiate while still recognizing the immense value this product holds.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay up to $1,100,000 for the product. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value you're asking for.

Bob, I appreciate your efforts in this negotiation, but we're reaching a critical point. To be frank, $1,300,000 is the absolute lowest I can go. This offer reflects the product's true worth and my desire to reach a fair deal. I believe it's more than reasonable considering the value you'll gain.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay up to $1,050,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you're asking for, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
